Name: Roman Tsegelskyi
AboutMe:
I'm a Software Engineer at Microsoft, working in Microsoft Office Engineering. Previously I worked as a research assistant at the S3 lab, while completing my MSc in Computer Science at Purdue University. Back in Ukraine, I also briefly worked in NetCracker Tech. as a Junior Customer Support Engineer on Telus Project.

I'm interested in all aspects of programming. My primary research interests lie in a broad areas of programming languages and compilers. I mostly program in R, C# and Perl nowadays, but I am also experienced with C/C++, Java, Python, and SQL programming. I would like to consider myself a tool builder, I enjoy developing tools that make programmers' lives easier.

#SOreadytohelp
